org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineFont2Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.CharacterTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineFontTag
          • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineFont2Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterTag, IDefineFontTag, IFontInfo, ITag
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefineFont3Tag

    public class DefineFont2Tag
extends DefineFontTag
implements IFontInfo
    Represents a DefineFont2 tag in a SWF file.

    The DefineFont2 tag extends the functionality of DefineFont. Enhancements include the following:

    1. 32-bit entries in the OffsetTable, for fonts with more than 64K glyphs.
    2. Mapping to device fonts, by incorporating all the functionality of DefineFontInfo.
    3. Font metrics for improved layout of dynamic glyph text.
    DefineFont2 tags are the only font definitions that can be used for dynamic text.
